head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths NEUMAN, SHELDON M.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths NEUMAN, SHELDON M.

block.p: NEUMAN-Sheldon M. Age 65. On September 21, 2000 in Miami, FL. after a brief illness. Devoted lifetime partner of Cami Green. Beloved father of Rachel & Jonah. Father-in-law of Richard. Proud grandfather of Olivia. Wonderful and caring brother of Herbert and Marvin and brother-in-law of Stephanie. We will remember him for his wisdom, strength of character and generous and loving spirit. Services on Sunday, 12:45 PM at ''The Riverside,'' 76th Street and Amsterdam Avenue.
